name: P39
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. An unfamiliar pickup truck. The truck parks, a person in work clothes exits and looks around the property. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
